  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_86926</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_86926</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Formation des montagnes en déplaçant des plats</string>
            <string language="en">Formation of mountains by moving plates</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung der Berge durch das Verschieben der 
Platten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação das montanhas movendo placas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione delle montagne spostando le piastre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός των βουνών με την κίνηση των πιάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación de montañas moviendo las placas</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme illustre la formation des montagnes quand le plat de Nazca et le plat américain bouge l'un vers l'autre.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the formation of mountains as the Nazca plate and American plate move toward each other.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Plat américain</string>
            <string language="en">American plate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">montagnes</string>
            <string language="en">Mountains</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plat de Nazca</string>
            <string language="en">Nazca plate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">roches</string>
            <string language="en">rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plats tectoniques</string>
            <string language="en">tectonic plates</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht die Anordnung der
Berge als die Nazca Platte und der amerikanischen Platte Bewegung in 
Richtung zu einander.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra a formação das montanhas 
como a placa de Nazca e do movimento americano da placa para se.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra la formazione delle 
montagne come la piastra di Nazca e del movimento americano della 
piastra verso a vicenda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί το σχηματισμό των βουνών 
ως πιάτο Nazca και της αμερικανικής κίνησης πιάτων η μια προς 
την άλλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra la formación de montañas 
como la placa de Nazca y del movimiento americano de la placa hacia 
uno a.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Amerikanische Platte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Berge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nazca Platte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Felsen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">tectonic Platten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Placa americana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Montanhas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Placa de Nazca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rochas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">placas tectonic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Piastra americana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Montagne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Piastra di Nazca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">roccie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">piastre tettoniche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αμερικανικό πιάτο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βουνά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πιάτο Nazca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βράχοι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τεκτονικά πιάτα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Placa americana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Montañas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Placa de Nazca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rocas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">placas tectónicas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
